description: This brown A-line midi skirt from Marni captures the irreverent style codes of the maison. Carefully crafted from a silk blend and designed to fall just below the knee, it features a pleated design and a concealed rear zip fastening. Team yours with a white blouse and platform sandals for an offbeat outfit win. This item fits small, please select the next size up.

transport.description: 此商品1个工作日内买手店APP上进行确认，确认后2-5个工作日发货，发货后预计10个工作日左右能到目的地。如遇节假日及海关地检有可能会相应延长（APP会出相应公告）
